docs.text: Please do the following onboarding tasks: 1. Learn Git basics Finish the following tutorial to learn the basics of Git: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mJ-qvsxPHpY If you prefer reading, you can also follow the official documentation: https://docs.github.com/en/get-started/getting-started-with-git/set-up-git 2. Get VScode with formatters Download VScode from the official website: https://code.visualstudio.com/ Download the following extensions from the VScode marketplace: Pylance Black Pylint Live Share Prettier 3. Get Docker for containers Get Docker and Docker Desktop https://www.docker.com/products/docker-desktop/ Follow the instructions on the README to get version plane-4.5.5 of SITL running in a container: https://github.com/ubcuas/MissionPlanner-Scripts NOTE: The docker container is a couple of GB in size, you can delete it after you are done with it. Use Docker to run SITL in a container on your computer Make a PR to this repo ( https://github.com/ubcuas/documentation_hub ) with a screenshot of the SITL running in a container on your computer in the submission folder
